analyzed: ārya tārāsragdharā stotram
ācārya sarvajñamitra viracitam
namaḥ tārāyai
bhaktyā pādau tava ārye kara puṭa mukuṭa āṭopa bhugna uttamāṅga
stāriṇi āpat śaraṇye nava nuti kusuma sragbhiḥ abhyarcayāmi
durlaṅdhye duḥkha vahnau vinipatita tanuḥ durbhagaḥ kāṃdiśīkaḥ
kim kim mūḍhaḥ karomi iti asakṛt api kṛta ārambha vaiyarthya khinnaḥ

original: śrutvā bhūyaḥ parebhyaḥ kṣatanayana iva vyomni candrārkalakṣmī-
analyzed: śrutvā bhūyas parebhyaḥ kṣata nayanaḥ iva vyomni candra arka lakṣmī
māloka āśā nibaddhaḥ para gati gamanaḥ tvām śraye pāpa hantrīm

original: sarvasmin sattvamārge nanu tava karuṇā nirviśeṣaṃ pravṛttā
analyzed: sarvasmin sattva mārge nanu tava karuṇā nirviśeṣam pravṛttā
tad madhye tad graheṇa grahaṇam upagatam mādṛśasya api avaśyam
sāmarthyam ca dvitīyam sakala jagat agha dhvānta tigmāṃśu bimbam

original: duḥkhyevāhaṃ tathāpi pratapati dhigaho duṣkṛtaṃ durvidagdham || 3 ||
analyzed: duḥkhyā iva aham tathā api pratapati dhik aho duṣkṛtam durvidagdham
dhik dhik mām mandabhāgyam divasakara rucā api a praṇūta andhakāram
tṛṣyantam kūla kacche hima śakala śilā śītale haimavatyāḥ
ratna dvīpa pratolyā vipula maṇi guhā geha garbhe daridram
nāthīkṛtya api anātham bhagavati bhavatīm sarva loka eka dhātrīm
mātā api stanya hetoḥ viruvati tanaye khedam āyāti putre
krodham dhatte pitā api pratidivasam asat prārthanāsu prayuktaḥ
tvam tu trailokya vāñchā vipula phala mahā kalpavṛkṣa agra vallī

original: sarvebhyo'bhyarthitārthān visṛjasi na ca te vikriyā jātu kācit || 5 ||
analyzed: sarvebhyaḥ abhyarthita arthān visṛjasi na ca te vikriyā jātu kācid

original: yo yaḥ klaiśaughavahnijvalitatanurahaṃ tāriṇī tasya tasye-
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ klaiśa ogha vahni jvalita tanuḥ aham tāriṇī tasya tasye

original: tyātmopajñaṃ pratijñāṃ kuru mayi saphalāṃ duḥkhapātālamagne |
analyzed: tya ātma upajñam pratijñām kuru mayi saphalām duḥkha pātāla magne
vardhante yāvat ete paruṣa paribhavāḥ prāṇinām dukha vegāḥ
samyaksaṃbuddha yāne praṇidhi dhṛta dhiyām tāvat eva anukampā
iti uccais ūrdhva vāhau nadati nuti pada vyājam ākranda nādam

original: nārhatyanyo'pyupekṣāṃ janani janayituṃ kiṃ punaryādṛśī tvam |
analyzed: na arhati anyā upi upekṣām janani janayitum kim punar yādṛśī tvam
tvattaḥ paśyan pareṣām abhimata vibhava prārthanāḥ prāpta kāmā
dahye sahyena bhūyastaram arati bhuvā santata antar jvareṇa  /

original: pāpī yadyasmi kasmāttvayi mama mahatī barddhate bhaktireṣā
analyzed: pāpī yadī asmi kasmāt tvayi mama mahatī barddhate bhaktiḥ eṣā

original: śrutyā smṛtyā ca nāmnāpyapaharasi haṭhātpāpamekā tvameva |
analyzed: śrutyā smṛtyā ca nāmnā api apaharasi haṭhāt pāpam ekā tvam eva

original: tyaktavyāpārabhārā tadasi mayi kathaṃ kathyatāṃ tathyakathye
analyzed: tyakta vyāpāra bhārā tat asi mayi katham kathyatām tathya kathye

original: pathyaṃ glāne mariṣyatyapi vipulakṛpaḥ kiṃ bhiṣag rorudhīti || 8 ||
analyzed: pathyam glāne mariṣyati api vipula kṛpaḥ kim bhiṣaj rorudhi iti
māyā mātsarya māna prabhṛtibhiḥ adhamaiḥ tulya kāla kramāt ca
svaiḥ doṣaiḥ vāhyamānaḥ maṭha karabhaḥ iva aneka sādhāraṇa aṃśaḥ

original: yuṣmatpādābjapūjāṃ na kṣaṇamapi labhe yattadarthe viśeṣā-
analyzed: yuṣmad pāda abja pūjām na kṣaṇam api labhe yat tad arthe viśeṣā
kārpaṇya dīna akṣara pada racanā syāt mama avandhya kāmā
saṃkṣobha utkṣipta velā taṭa vikaṭa caṭat sphoṭa moṭṭa aṭṭahāsāt
majjadbhiḥ bhinna naukaiḥ sa karuṇa rudita ākranda niṣpanda mandaiḥ
svacchandam devi sadyas tvad abhinuti paraiḥ tīram uttīryate ibdheḥ
dhūma bhrānta abhra garbha udbhava gagana gṛha utsaṅga riṅgat sphuliṅga
sphūrjat jvālā karāla jvalana java viśat veśma viśrānta śayyāḥ
tvayi ābaddha praṇāma añjali puṭa mukuṭāḥ gadgada udgīta yācñāḥ
prodyat vidyut vilāsa ujjvala jalada javaiḥ ādhriyante kṣaṇena
dāna ambhaḥ pūryamāṇa ubhaya kaṭakaṭaka ālambi rolamba mālā
hūṅkāra āhūyamāna pratigaja janita dveṣa vahneḥ dvipasya
danta anta uttuṅga dolā tala tulita tanuḥ tvām anusmṛtya mṛtyum
pratyācaṣṭe prahṛṣṭaḥ pṛthu śikhara śiraḥ koṭi koṭṭa upaviṣṭaḥ
prauḍha prāsa prahāra prahata nara śiraḥ śūla vallī utsavāyām
śūnya aṭavyām kara agra graha vilasat asi spheṭaka sphīta darpān
dasyūn dāsye niyuṅkte sa bhṛkuṭi kuṭila bhrū kaṭākṣa īkṣita akṣām
ścintā lekhanī akhinna sphuṭa likhita padam nāma dhāma śriyām te
vajrakūra prahāra prakhara nakha mukha utkhāta matta ibha kumbha
ścyotat sāndra asra dhauta sphūṭa vikaṭa saṭā saṅkaṭa skandha sandhiḥ
krudhyan nāpitsuḥ ārāt upari mṛgaripuḥ tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭra utkaṭa āsya
strasyan āvṛtya yāti tvad ucita racita stotra digdha artha vācaḥ
dhūma āvarta andhakāra ākṛti vikṛta phaṇi sphāra phūtkāra pūra
vyāpāra vyāpta vaktra sphurat uru rasanā rajjukā nāśa pāśaiḥ
pāpāt sambhūya bhūyas tava guṇa gaṇanā tatparaḥ tvad parātmā
dhatte matta ali mālā valaya kuvala sraja vibhūṣām vibhūtim
ścañcat vācāṭa ceṭa utkaṭa raṭita kaṭu granthi pāśa upagūḍhaḥ

original: kṣuttṛṭkṣāmopakaṇṭhastyajati sa sapadi vyāpadaṃ tāṃ durantāṃ
analyzed: kṣudh tṛṣ kṣāma upakaṇṭhaḥ tyajati sa sapadi vyāpadam tām durantām
yaḥ yāyāt ārya tārā caraṇa śaraṇa tām snigdha bandhu ujjhitaḥ api
māyā nirmāṇa karma krama kṛta vikṛta aneka nepathya mithyā
rūpa ārambha anurūpa praharaṇa kiraṇa āḍambara uḍḍāmarāṇi
tvad tantra uddhārya mantra smṛti hṛta duritasya avahanti apradhṛṣyām
preta prota antra tantrī nicaya viracita srañji rakṣāṃsi rakṣām
garjat jīmūta mūrti trimada mada nadī baddha dhārā andhakāre
vidhut dyotāyamāna praharaṇa kiraṇe niṣpatat bāṇa varṣe
ruddhaḥ saṅgrāma kāle prabala bhuja balaiḥ vidviṣadbhiḥ dviṣadbhiḥ
s tvad datta utsāha puṣṭiḥ prasabham ari mahīm eka vīraḥ pinaṣṭi
pāpa ācāra anubandha uddhṛta gada vigalat pūti pūya asra visra
tvak māṃsa āsakta nāḍī mukha kuhara galat jantu jagdha kṣata aṅgāḥ
yuṣmad pāda upasevā gada vara guṭikā abhyāsa bhakti prasaktā
jāyante jātarūpa pratinidhi vapuṣaḥ puṇḍarīka āyata akṣāḥ
viśrāntam śrauta pātre gurubhiḥ upahṛtam yasya nāmnā āyabhaikṣyam
vidvat goṣṭhīṣu yaḥ ca śruta dhana virahāt mūka tām abhyupetaḥ
sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣā vibhava samuditam prāpya vāc īśvara tvam
saḥ api tvad bhakti śaktyā harati nṛpa sabhe vādi siṃhāsanāni
bhū śayyā dhūli dhūmraḥ sphuṭita kaṭi taṭī karpaṭa uddyotita aṅgaḥ
yūka āyūṃṣi prapiṃṣan para puṭa puratas karpare tarpaṇa arthī
tvām ārādhya adhyavasyan vara yuvati vahat cāmara smera cārvī
mūrvī dhatte mada andha dvipa daśana ghanām uddhṛtta eka ātapatrām
sevā karmānta śilpa praṇaya vinimaya upāya paryāya khinnāḥ
prāc janma upātta puṇya upacita śubha phalam vittam a prāpnuvantaḥ
daiva atikrāmaṇīm tvām kṛpaṇa jana jananī artham abhyarthya bhūme
rbhūyas nirvānta cāmīkara nikara nidhīn nirdhanāḥ prāpnuvanti
vṛtti chede vilakṣaḥ kṣata nivasanayā bhāryayā bhartsyamānaḥ
dūrāt ātmambhari tvāt sva jana suta suhṛd bandhubhiḥ varjyamānaḥ
tvayi āvedya sva duḥkham turaga khura mukha utkhāta sīmnām
mīṣṭe sva antaḥpura strī valaya jhaṇajhaṇā jāta nidrā prabodhaḥ
caṅkrat diś cakra cumbi sphurat uru kiraṇā lakṣaṇa alaṅkṛtā strī
senā nīḥ vīra sainyaḥ bhavati bhagavati tvad prasāda aṃśa leśāt
svacchandam candana ambhaḥ surabhi maṇi śilā datta saṅketa kāntaḥ
kāntā krīḍā anurāgāt abhinava racita ātithya tathya upacāraḥ
tvad vidyā labdha siddhiḥ malaya madhuvanam yāti vidyādhara indraḥ
khaṅga aṃśu śyāma pīna unnata bhuja parigha prollasat pārihāryaḥ
hāra ākrānta stana antāḥ śravaṇa kuvalaya sparddhamāna āyata akṣyaḥ
mandāra udāra veṇī taruṇa parimala āmoda mādyat dvirephāḥ
kāñcī nāda anubandha uddhatatara caraṇa udāra mañjīra tūryā
prārthayante smara mada muditāḥ sādarāḥ deva kanyāḥ
munmajjat pārijāta druma madhupa vadhū uddhūta dhūlī vitānām
vīṇā veṇu pravīṇa amara pura ramaṇī datta mādhurya tūryām
kṛtvā yuṣmad saparyām anubhavati ciram nandana udyāna yātrām
karpūra elā lavaṅga tvac aguru nalada kṣoda gandha udakāyām
kāntā kandarpa darpa utkaṭa kuca kuhara āvarta viśrānta vīcyām
mandākinyām amanda chaṭa salila sarit krīḍayā sundarībhiḥ
krīḍanti tvad gata antaḥkaraṇa pariṇata uttapta puṇya prabhāvāḥ
svarga utsaṅga idhi rūḍhaḥ sura kariṇi jhaṇat bhūṣaṇa udbhāsita aṅge
śacyā dos dāma dolā virala valayita uddāma romāñca mūrtiḥ
pūtaḥ tvad dṛṣṭipātaiḥ avati sura mahīm hīra bhinna prakoṣṭhaḥ
prodyat bāla arka koṭī paṭutara kiraṇa āpūryamāṇa trilokam
tvad rūpam bhāvyamānam bhavati bhava bhaya chittye janma bhājām
paśyanti eke sa kopam praharaṇa kiraṇa udgīrṇa dos daṇḍa khaṇḍa
vyāpta vyoma antarālam valaya phaṇi phaṇā dāruṇa āhārya caryam
dviṣṭa vyatra asi hāsa uḍḍamara ḍamaruka uḍḍāmara āsphāla velā
vetāla uttāla tāla pramada mada mahā keli kolāhala ugram
kecid tu ekaika roma udgama gata gagana ābhoga bhū bhū tala stha
svastha brahma indra rudra prabhṛti nara marut siddha gandharva nāgam
citram trailokya vandayam sthira cara racita aśeṣa bhāva svabhāvam
lākṣā sindūra rāga aruṇatara kiraṇa āditya lauhityam eke
śrīmat sāndra indranīla upala dalita dala kṣoda nīlam tathā anye
kṣīrābdhi kṣubdha dugdha adhikatara dhavalam kāñcana ābham ca kecid
tvad rūpam viśva rūpam sphaṭika vat upadhā yukti bhedāt vibhinnam

original: sākṣādvetti tvadīyāṃ guṇagaṇagaṇanāṃ sarvavit tatsuto vā |
analyzed: sākṣāt vetti tvadīyām guṇa gaṇa gaṇanām sarva vid tad sutaḥ vā

original: yastu vyādāya vaktraṃ valibhujaraṭitaṃ mādṛśo rāraṭīti
analyzed: yaḥ tu vyādāya vaktram vali bhuja raṭitam mādṛśaḥ rāraṭi iti
vyāpad sā tīvra duḥkha jvara janita rujaḥ cetasaḥ hāsya hetuḥ
yat me vijñāpyamānam prathamataram adaḥ tvam viśeṣeṇa vettrī
tad vayāhāra atireka śrama vidhiḥ abudha svānta santoṣa hetuḥ

original: kintu snigdhasya bandhorviṣamiva purato duḥkhamudgīrya vācāṃ
analyzed: kintu snigdhasya bandhoḥ viṣam iva puratas duḥkham udgīrya vācām
jñāta arthasya api duḥkhī hṛdaya laghu tayā svastha tām vindati iva
dehi

original: puṣṭiṃ jñānopadeśaiḥ kuru dhanakaruṇe dhvaṃsaya dhvāntamantaḥ |
analyzed: puṣṭim jñāna upadeśaiḥ kuru dhanakaruṇe dhvaṃsaya dhvāntam antar
tvad stotra ambhaḥ pavitrīkṛta manasi mayi śreyasaḥ sthānam ekam
dṛṣṭam yasmāt amogham jagati tava guṇa stotra mātram prajānām
saṃstutya tvad guṇa ogha avayavam aniyata iyattam āptam mayā yat
puṇyam puṇya ārdra vāñchā phala madhura rasa āsvādam āmukti bhogyam
lokaḥ tena ārya lokeśvara caraṇa tala svastika svasti cihnā
mahnāya ayam prayāyāt sugata suta mahīm tām sukhāvatī upākhyām
śrī sarvajñamitra viracitam ārya tārāsragdharā stotram samāptam
